creditline: Bequest of Louis W. Hill, Jr.
inscription: left: 賤の女おやま [0]岩井杜若; center: 将軍太郎良門 [5]市川海老蔵; right: 志つま石太郎 [5]市川海老蔵
medium: Woodblock prints (nishiki-e), ink and color on paper
signed: on each sheet:  五渡亭國貞画 {Gototei Kunisada ga}
text: Related to the play Onikirimaru mimasu no kakutsuba 鬼切丸三升角鐔, performed at the Ichimura Theater in the 11th month of 1837.
title: Actors Ichikawa Ebizō V in a quick costume change as Shizuma Ishitarō (R) and Shōgun Tarō Yoshikado (C) and Iwai Tojaku as Oyama, a woman of lowly birth (L)
